Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 209B (UCCJEA).proposition: This Court has subject matter jurisdiction and personal jurisdiction pursuant to Massachusetts General Laws governing domestic relations and custody matters, including the Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act, Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 209B (UCCJEA), because this is the Court that entered the controlling order and the child and parties reside in Worcester County.
